text: Xupma brrda phu thi bricakh thraphy khxng phwk khea nı thang khx ngxallxh nan dang xupmay meld phuch meld hnung thi ngxk khun pen ced rwng sung nı tæla rwng nan mi rxng meld læa xallxh nan ca thrng pheimphun kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh xik læa xallxh pen phuthrng kwangkhwang phuthrng rxbru
